types:type.name: peopleData
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type peopleData = {| people: {| person: Array<{| name: String |}> |} |} {"example": "{\\\"people\\\":{\\\"person\\\":[{\\\"name\\\":\\\"John\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Deb\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"DA\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Abc\\\"}]}}"}

types:type.name: courseName
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type courseName = {| field1: String, field2: String, field3: String |} {"example": "{\\\"field1\\\":\\\"Mulesoft\\\",\\\"field2\\\":\\\"Course\\\",\\\"field3\\\":\\\"Fundamentals\\\"}"}
